title: Aircraft
author: David, Evan John, 1877-1961

quoteFirst: Whether we account for it by the extreme heat or not, it is nevertheless a fact that the sun lags along behind our clocks during this entire month; on the 1st, not reaching the meridian till 12:0
quoteLast: ; on the 15th till 12:05:44 p. m., and on the 30th till six minutes and nine seconds after noon.
title: The Chautauquan, Vol. 04, July 1884, No. 10
author: Chautauqua Literary and Scientific Circle; Chautauqua Institution; Flood, Theodore L., 1842- [Editor]
